attributes.action: Introduce mini Universal Basic Income now.
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the number of deaths and and an economic collapse leading to widespread poverty by providing a guaranteed income to everyone now.
attributes.background: Let everybody in the UK get money in their pocket to buy food and survive the next few months. Let them feel confident about the future - give £1000 to each and every adult ASAP and £500 for every child.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
